name: Bloodstone
description: The fabled Bloodstone grants impressive abilities at an equally chilling price. Many bodies lie in its wake, with doubtless more to come, because there is no shortage of power within the darkness, only the will to seize it.

skinlines.name: Bloodstone
skinlines.description: Terrors abound in the depths of night, with none as fearsome as the Bloodstone cults. Shrieks fill the air in their presence, while the streets run red, for their master hungers and must be satiated.
